= Welcome to Jabberoid =

If you are interested to participating in this project with development, documentation or organisation, feel free to contact one of the project owners or ask in the Google Group

 http://groups.google.com/group/jabberoid-discuss

for a membership.

This project was just founded (25th October 2008), so there is a lot of work to do until the first stable release can take place. Nevertheless, the basic implementations are already made.
